Title: Tech Exec | SaaS / Data / Fintech | Ex-Nasdaq | Ex-Thomson Reuters | Led Growth at 2x $100M+ Start-up Exits |
About: With over 15 years of experience in banking, capital markets, software and data - I am an entrepreneurial results-oriented sales leader, who is passionate about the intersection between finance and technology.

Current Experience.Description: Ontopical helps businesses discover and win government work. Our AI-driven intelligence platform detects early signals from public sector data about upcoming contract opportunities. We mine millions of public data sources including agendas, minutes, budgets and videos within cities, counties and school districts to help our customers win more business. Find out more at Ontopical.com.

Previous Experience.Description: Globally responsible for relationship, account strategic direction and revenue growth with major financial institutions across all business units and technology.
Responsible for revenue and relationship with two largest financial institutions in Canada.

Previous Experience.Role: Vice President, Global Head of Sales & Business Development
Previous Experience.Description:
I led sales and business development for Quandl, with a focus on sourcing and distributing unique, alpha-generating, alternative data for institutional clients.

As the first dedicated business development employee at Quandl in 2016, I grew revenue (2x each year), established a global institutional client-base and built an internal sales team, resulting in an acquisition by Nasdaq Inc. in December 2018.  Participated in deal due diligence and strategic planning.

Quandl is the largest provider of alternative data for financial professionals. The company sources, evaluates and productizes undiscovered data assets, transforming them into quantified, actionable intelligence for select institutional clients. With a customer base that includes the world’s top hedge funds, asset managers and investment banks, Quandl delivers financial, economic and alternative data to over 400,000 people worldwide.

Flinks is an API-based data & analytics company, pioneering 'Open Banking' in financial services.  I led Sales, Relationship Management, Marketing, Partnerships, Product & Client Operations/Support functions at Flinks, reporting to President/CEO & Board.  Drove growth of company from Seed/pre-Series A to $100M Series B ($30M growth capital) investment and 7x revenue growth, while scaling commercial team from ~10->~40.  Mandate also included overseeing US expansion, new product/market strategies and M&A diligence.  Clients include major Canadian/US banks, fintech, credit unions and corporates.  Still remain a current shareholder.

Previous Experience.Role: Vice President, Global Head of Sales & Business Development, Quandl
Previous Experience.Description: Following Nasdaq's acquisition of Quandl in December 2018, I led a team of Regional Managing Directors and Sales Directors in Toronto, New York & London driving sales and business development for Quandl.  Our team had a focus on sourcing and distributing unique, alpha-generating, alternative data for institutional clients.  Quandl's business is within Nasdaq's Global Information Services business unit.  Reported to the SVP, Global Head of Sales & Partnerships.

HOVR.IT was acquired by Slyce Inc. in December 2013. www.slyce.it

HOVR.IT was a Toronto-based company focused on making the internet-enabled shopping experience better and faster through visual search technology.  Angel investment and board member.

Slyce Acquires HOVR.IT - Financial Post, Dec 2013:
http://business.financialpost.com/2013/12/04/slyce-hovrit/?__lsa=eed0-3763
Operated from 2010-2021. Launched cloud computing services company SmartCloud Inc. focused on providing cloud applications, platform and infrastructure to SMEs in Canada.

Managed business with over 50 commodities & energy clients across Canada.  Built relationships with senior executives of corporations with market capitalizations >$5B to strengthen business partnerships.  Analysed revenue impacts of the Reuters acquisition in market segments and executed over 25 product migrations with key clients.

Analyzed profit drivers and implemented product, process and management system changes to improve operations in the manufacturing, pharmaceutical, food processing, engineering design and insurance industries.

- Increased on-time delivery in transportation engineering from 23% to 90%, achieving savings in labour, material and freight.
- Optimized production line and route scheduling in airline catering company, increasing operating cash flow by over $3M.
- Performed due diligence analysis with mid-level and senior management resulting in new business development for the firm.

Recommendations.Name: Al H.
Recommendations.Role: Passionate about building winning sales teams
Recommendations.Header: February 26, 2016, Al worked with Clayton on the same team
Recommendations.Details: I worked on the Major Account Management team with Clayton for more than 3 years at Thomson Reuters. In his role as Global Lead, Clayton secured several multi-million dollar renewals and sales deals with two Major Canadian Banks. Clayton's deep knowledge of the capital markets and FinTech space was instrumental in securing new business and building relationships with the C-level. He's is a skilled negotiator and with an uncanny ability to cut through the noise and address the real customer issues. He was a very supportive colleague and I thoroughly enjoyed my time working and learn from him.

Recommendations.Name: Adam J.
Recommendations.Role: I build revenue generating PLG/user onboarding programs through data, accountability, and scale | Shopify-alum, KOHO-alum | Dad | Founder, CEO | Product & Ops Leader
Recommendations.Header: December 2, 2015, Adam worked with Clayton but they were at different companies
Recommendations.Details: Clayton has fantastic experience and skills in the fundamentals of starting a business. As a mentor, investor and board member in HOVR.IT, he was consistently a resource of good business sense, asking the right questions, and very importantly enthusiasm. His skills were also very valuable as we navigated the challenges of raising money, valuations, pricing, and market dynamics. He was a great supporter and advocate for our wins big and small, and continues to be a great friend and source of advice.

Comments.Post Description:
Huge congrats to Clayton Feick, Derrick Koenig, the Ontopical team, Rhino, Graphite Ventures and Accelerate Fund on the recently closed raise for Ontopical! 💥💥💥💰🙌

What a great roster of new investors in an incredible company - and with Clayton Feick and Derrick Koenig at the helm of Ontopical, this company will surely continue to knock it out of the park!

Myself, Jacob Young, Patrick Musgrave, Nnaemeka (Emy) Ezeani and the broader Osler, Hoskin & Harcourt LLP team were thrilled - and truly grateful for the opportunity - to support Ontopical and look forward to continuing to support the company in its journey! 

On another note, go #albertatech! It’s no coincidence that we’re seeing such strong #VCs double down on what #albertatech companies are building - the all-time high support for tech in #alberta, the migration of talent to this province and the extremely higher calibre of #founders  building amazing businesses here continues to make #alberta a #techdestination. 

Let’s go!!

Clayton Feick Derrick Koenig David Hogarth Omi Velasco Craig Leonard Arden Tse Yasmine Al-Hussein, MBA 

#EHGYYC #venturecapital #founders #albertatech #ontopical
Comments.Contact comment: Thanks Michael Grantmyre!  Really appreciated your expertise and the support from everyone at Osler, Hoskin & Harcourt LLP.

Comments.Post Description:
Government procurement has long been relationship-based. But without boots (many, many boots) on the ground, how does a service provider know where and when to build which relationships?

Ontopical’s AI-enabled business development co-pilot figures this out for you. With a data feed supplied by the unstructured minutes, agendas, plans, budgets, and videos of tens of thousands of towns, cities, counties, and school districts, the most relevant and specific prospects are delivered directly to your inbox.

Clayton Feick and Derrick Koenig are changing the game for business-to-government (B2G) sales professionals everywhere, unearthing 8-figure sales opportunities that would otherwise fly below the radar of E&C groups, telecoms, and professional services firms across North America.

We’re excited to welcome the Ontopical team to the crash and would like to shout out Craig Leonard and Omi Velasco for taking charge of a great opportunity!

Rhino post in comments below

Clayton Feick Derrick Koenig Fraser Hall Julian (Jay) Rhind Candace Hobin Mitch Richardson Nicholas Hyldelund

We are thrilled to be an investor in Ontopical, who announced their $3.3 Million Seed Extension round! Congratulations to the team and their innovative solution, attracting high-quality service providers to public works contracts and creating more transparency.
Comments.Contact comment: Thank you Graphite Ventures and especially, Craig Leonard and Omi Velasco!  We are very pleased to join the group of portfolio companies at Graphite.

🚀 Thrilled to share Ontopical's $3.3M funding round, led by Rhino and Graphite Ventures, with Accelerate Fund participating! If your company participates in public sector RFP opportunities in Canada and the US and would like to gain insights into 7 or 8-figure RFPs before they are published, make sure to get in touch with Ontopical's team.

Clayton Feick and Derrick Koenig have created an AI-enabled, indispensable tool for businesses navigating the intricate world of public sector RFPs. Ontopical monitors thousands of sites where essential public sector data resides, including meeting agendas, minutes, videos, budgets, and more. With Ontopical, organizations gain a competitive edge through real-time RFP alerts, ensuring they are the first to discover relevant opportunities before they are published. Ontopical's expertise lies in transforming extensive, unstructured government data into actionable insights, enabling businesses to strategically position themselves for upcoming contract opportunities, reduce sales costs, and significantly improve win rates. Learn more at ontopical.com/about-us.

It's been an honour to work with David Hogarth, Arden Tse, Yasmine Al-Hussein, MBA, Michael Grantmyre, Jacob Young, Sean Del Giallo, Chase Irwin, Louise Lee. 

cc. Craig Leonard, Lance Laking, Aaron Bast, Kevin Madill, Steve Currie, Mackenzie Puklicz, Alexander Barclay, Mohamed Elabshihy, Ingrid Amor Gahol, Shelley Tang, CPA, Ezekiel Abrahams, Michael Ho
Comments.Contact comment: Thank you Omi Velasco!  Look forward to working together and excited to be part of the Graphite Ventures portfolio.

Comments.Post Description:
Today we are thrilled to announce the closing of our $3.3M Seed Extension round, led by Graphite Ventures and Rhino Ventures with participation from Accelerate FC Fund III LLC. 🚀 

We’re stronger with the backing of investors who align with our mission to help more qualified businesses discover and win government work.

See our announcement for full details: https://lnkd.in/grVRptnd

With the funding, we will further develop our AI-driven intelligence platform which detects early signals about upcoming contract opportunities from millions of sources of public sector data including video. 

We’ll also expand our business further across North America, and grow our team! 📈 

We’re looking to hire data engineers, data scientists, AI/ML specialists and add new members to our sales and marketing teams, with the majority of roles in Calgary. See our website for current job opportunities. 🖥 

#InvestmentNews #ABTech #YYCTech #Hiring #AI #calgarybusiness #yyctech #calgarystartup #startupcommunity #startupnews

🗼Pre-seed and Seed Venture Capital Funds🗼

The most complete and largest list of Pre-seed and Seed Venture Capital funds to date.

🌱 100+ VC Funds 
🌱 VC Fund Name 
🌱 VC Fund Website URL
🌱 VC Fund Analyst, Associate, Partners email and contact 

Spent a decent amount of time collecting this for our existing round of fundraising. This is a good list if you are interested in seeking pre-seed & seed.

1st Degree Connections: Comment "pre-seed" AND DM me "pre-seed"

2nd and 3rd Degree Connections: Comment "pre-seed" AND please send me a connection request with the note "pre-seed" (without that connection request, I can't DM you the resource).

I have some exciting news! After supporting Startups for several years, I am thrilled to announce that I have joined the Ontopical team as a Lead, Internal and Client Operations. I’m excited to be making the transition from supporting Startups to working alongside so many talented individuals. This team is doing incredible things and I look forward to what's to come!

📢 Announcing the newest addition to the Rhino Crash, Ontopical! (Full announcement in comments)

🏛️Local governments spend over $2 trillion in North America each year, however the sales and procurement process is largely relationship based, heavily favouring incumbents.

💻 Ontopical is the only automated software solution that allows organizations to efficiently scale their local government monitoring strategies and uncover potential revenue opportunities months or years before they reach the RFP stage.

🦏 We are big believers that Ontopical is well positioned to become the winning solution in the B2G sales market. We're stoked to be welcoming Clayton Feick and Derrick Koenig to the Rhino Crash and couldn't think of a better official welcome than to win best dressed with some snazzy outfits @ TechSwing23 (and 14th place in golf 😂)

Nicholas Hyldelund David Hogarth Julian (Jay) Rhind Mitch Richardson Fraser Hall Candace Hobin
Comments.Contact comment: Fashion points all around!  Thanks again for the great outfits, David Hogarth, Nicholas Hyldelund and Rhino!  We've set the bar high for TechSwing'24 (Crystal Phillips Josh Malate).

Comments.Contact comment: Congrats Darryl!  Best of luck in the new role.

Comments.Post Description: 🚀 Excited to share today that Ontopical has secured $3.3 million in funding. This financial support will empower us to accelerate our mission of transforming the way companies win business in the public sector. Kudos to our remarkable team and thank you Rhino and Graphite Ventures and Accelerate Fund for believing in our vision and for your participation in the round.

With fresh funding from Rhino, Graphite Ventures, and Accelerate Fund, Calgary-based Ontopical aims to make it easier for businesses across North America to discover and win local government contracts. #YYCtech

The reports are true - tech investment is picking up in Alberta. We closed five investments this quarter, keeping our small and mighty team busy. 

With Ontopical,  Derrick Koenig has built an incredible platform and it was a real pleasure working with Clayton Feick  to get our investment done. Clayton's a shining example of how a responsive and communicative CEO can make the due diligence process go smoothly and the two of them make a superstar combination of tech and business savvy. 

Hats off to our industry colleagues Omi Velasco and Craig Leonard at Graphite Ventures whom we love working with for also bringing in Rhino and really taking this raise over the top!

We’re thrilled to announce we’ve invested in Calgary’s Ontopical! Our investment is part of its recent $3.3 million seed extension raise, co-led by Rhino Ventures and Graphite Ventures. 

Ontopical helps private businesses discover and win government work. Its AI-driven technology tracks millions of sources of public data in real-time including meeting minutes, agendas, budgets, plans and videos to detect early signals on upcoming contract opportunities and policy changes. 

The platform is already used by North America’s largest telecom players, major architectural, engineering and construction firms, energy and utilities providers, health services, software, IoT and technology companies to gain a competitive advantage on RFPs and emerging business opportunities. 

Next up for the team is enhancing its platform, expanding its business further across North America and growing its team in Calgary including hiring data engineers, data scientists, AI/ML specialists and new members to its sales and marketing teams.

Kudos to Clayton Feick, Derrick Koenig and the entire Ontopical team for achieving this milestone! We look forward to supporting your continued growth as you level the playing field for public works contracts. 

See our official announcement: https://lnkd.in/gj8uzVtB 

See the news in BetaKit: https://lnkd.in/grVRptnd 

#InvestmentNews #ABtech #YYCTech #CDNtech #AI #Procurement #BusinessDevelopment #Government #startups #startup #techstartup #VentureCapital #VC #investing #investment
Comments.Contact comment: Thanks Arden Tse, Yasmine Al-Hussein, MBA and Brad Johns for your investment and support!

Post Details.Text:
How much does your water utility know about managing risk on projects?

Maybe you’ve thought about the big things. But risk comes in all shapes and sizes.

It could be as simple as someone on a water treatment plant project noticing, “Hey, you know what? This support is going right through where the pipe needs to go. Somebody needs to redesign that.”

So now the contractor out there trying to build the facility has crews sitting around and waiting for a new design. 

Well, the owner — the city, in this case — has to make all that communication happen.

Or let’s say the electricians are wiring things together, and the steelworkers up above are grinding away and causing sparks to fall on the electricians down below.

The electrician is going to come back and say, “Hey, we’re not going to work here … this isn’t safe.” 

So, they clear out.

Well, guess what?

They were supposed to get that work done today. And so now the utility bears the responsibility of coordinating those contracts.

All of those things are part of the risks that come along with awarding contracts based on who has the lowest bid, instead of who has the qualifications to be able to take on that risk.

And when you’ve got municipal water departments that are down to a handful of people while trying to navigate increasingly complex projects, being able to transfer that risk takes away a lot of pressure.

Which way makes the most sense for you?

Ping us if you need help navigating the risk process.

Post Details.Text:
What a week in Edmonton for Carbon Capture Canada! Second annual event showcasing the best of #carboncapture; it was a pleasure to be able to attend and participate. 

I had the opportunity to connect with lots of people at the Conference, Trade Show and associated events, including:
➕ Pre-Conference Networking Reception with International CCS Knowledge Centre at Greta YEG
➕ Promoting Spartan Controls' products and solutions at our Booth &  Hospitality Event with Customers at DOSC, complete with a specialty cocktail named 'Policy Gap Carbon Blues' 
➕ Moderating a Fireside Chat with Lisa Tebbutt, Director, BD at Wolf Midstream on the Conference stage
➕ Networking with 80+ women and men at the Young Women in Energy (YWE) Women in CCS Networking Event sponsored by dmg events, and hearing remarks by Bre Fox Director, Commercial at Capital Power & Chair of the 2023 Carbon Capture Canada Conference
➕ And to top it all off, watching my friend Candice Paton win CCUS Leader of the Year at the Carbon Capture Canada Awards Dinner!

 Already looking forward to next year! #CCS

Post Details.Text:
Excited about continuing to help companies win more public sector work, with our new funding announcement - and thanks to Rhino, Graphite Ventures and Accelerate Fund for partnering with Derrick Koenig and I, to support Ontopical's growth plans.

Also, thank you Josh Scott for covering our news today.

We’re thrilled to announce we’ve invested in Calgary’s Ontopical! Our investment is part of its recent $3.3 million seed extension raise, co-led by Rhino Ventures and Graphite Ventures. 

Ontopical helps private businesses discover and win government work. Its AI-driven technology tracks millions of sources of public data in real-time including meeting minutes, agendas, budgets, plans and videos to detect early signals on upcoming contract opportunities and policy changes. 

The platform is already used by North America’s largest telecom players, major architectural, engineering and construction firms, energy and utilities providers, health services, software, IoT and technology companies to gain a competitive advantage on RFPs and emerging business opportunities. 

Next up for the team is enhancing its platform, expanding its business further across North America and growing its team in Calgary including hiring data engineers, data scientists, AI/ML specialists and new members to its sales and marketing teams.

Kudos to Clayton Feick, Derrick Koenig and the entire Ontopical team for achieving this milestone! We look forward to supporting your continued growth as you level the playing field for public works contracts. 

See our official announcement: https://lnkd.in/gj8uzVtB 

See the news in BetaKit: https://lnkd.in/grVRptnd 

#InvestmentNews #ABtech #YYCTech #CDNtech #AI #Procurement #BusinessDevelopment #Government #startups #startup #techstartup #VentureCapital #VC #investing #investment

Today we are thrilled to announce the closing of our $3.3M Seed Extension round, led by Graphite Ventures and Rhino Ventures with participation from Accelerate FC Fund III LLC. 🚀 

We’re stronger with the backing of investors who align with our mission to help more qualified businesses discover and win government work.

See our announcement for full details: https://lnkd.in/grVRptnd

With the funding, we will further develop our AI-driven intelligence platform which detects early signals about upcoming contract opportunities from millions of sources of public sector data including video. 

We’ll also expand our business further across North America, and grow our team! 📈 

We’re looking to hire data engineers, data scientists, AI/ML specialists and add new members to our sales and marketing teams, with the majority of roles in Calgary. See our website for current job opportunities. 🖥 

#InvestmentNews #ABTech #YYCTech #Hiring #AI #calgarybusiness #yyctech #calgarystartup #startupcommunity #startupnews

Post Details.Text:
📢 Announcing the newest addition to the Rhino Crash, Ontopical! (Full announcement in comments)

🏛️Local governments spend over $2 trillion in North America each year, however the sales and procurement process is largely relationship based, heavily favouring incumbents.

💻 Ontopical is the only automated software solution that allows organizations to efficiently scale their local government monitoring strategies and uncover potential revenue opportunities months or years before they reach the RFP stage.

🦏 We are big believers that Ontopical is well positioned to become the winning solution in the B2G sales market. We're stoked to be welcoming Clayton Feick and Derrick Koenig to the Rhino Crash and couldn't think of a better official welcome than to win best dressed with some snazzy outfits @ TechSwing23 (and 14th place in golf 😂)

Nicholas Hyldelund David Hogarth Julian (Jay) Rhind Mitch Richardson Fraser Hall Candace Hobin

Today we are thrilled to announce the closing of our $3.3M Seed Extension round, led by Graphite Ventures and Rhino Ventures with participation from Accelerate FC Fund III LLC. 🚀 

We’re stronger with the backing of investors who align with our mission to help more qualified businesses discover and win government work.

See our announcement for full details: https://lnkd.in/grVRptnd

With the funding, we will further develop our AI-driven intelligence platform which detects early signals about upcoming contract opportunities from millions of sources of public sector data including video. 

We’ll also expand our business further across North America, and grow our team! 📈 

We’re looking to hire data engineers, data scientists, AI/ML specialists and add new members to our sales and marketing teams, with the majority of roles in Calgary. See our website for current job opportunities. 🖥

Post Details.Text: 🚀 Excited to share today that Ontopical has secured $3.3 million in funding. This financial support will empower us to accelerate our mission of transforming the way companies win business in the public sector. Kudos to our remarkable team and thank you Rhino and Graphite Ventures and Accelerate Fund for believing in our vision and for your participation in the round.

Reactions.Contact Role: Principal, Graphite Ventures | Executive Director, VCAA

Post Details.Text:
🚀 Thrilled to share Ontopical's $3.3M funding round, led by Rhino and Graphite Ventures, with Accelerate Fund participating! If your company participates in public sector RFP opportunities in Canada and the US and would like to gain insights into 7 or 8-figure RFPs before they are published, make sure to get in touch with Ontopical's team.

Clayton Feick and Derrick Koenig have created an AI-enabled, indispensable tool for businesses navigating the intricate world of public sector RFPs. Ontopical monitors thousands of sites where essential public sector data resides, including meeting agendas, minutes, videos, budgets, and more. With Ontopical, organizations gain a competitive edge through real-time RFP alerts, ensuring they are the first to discover relevant opportunities before they are published. Ontopical's expertise lies in transforming extensive, unstructured government data into actionable insights, enabling businesses to strategically position themselves for upcoming contract opportunities, reduce sales costs, and significantly improve win rates. Learn more at ontopical.com/about-us.

It's been an honour to work with David Hogarth, Arden Tse, Yasmine Al-Hussein, MBA, Michael Grantmyre, Jacob Young, Sean Del Giallo, Chase Irwin, Louise Lee. 

cc. Craig Leonard, Lance Laking, Aaron Bast, Kevin Madill, Steve Currie, Mackenzie Puklicz, Alexander Barclay, Mohamed Elabshihy, Ingrid Amor Gahol, Shelley Tang, CPA, Ezekiel Abrahams, Michael Ho

About.Owerview:
Track the conversations captured in local government meetings without having to read thousands of pages or watch hours of video.

With the Ontopical Tracker, you can focus on growing your business rather than time-consuming research. Ontopical offers a platform that provides insights into topics of interest being discussed by local government organizations across North America. You can easily find new opportunities and make strategic business decisions with more predictable outcomes.

We aim to be the global-leader in transparency-enhancing solutions, capturing the endless unstructured data from local government organizations. Our solution applies a ‘bottoms-up’ approach whereby we are first and foremost focused on local government organizations. We provide business intelligence to help you build new revenue streams, increase efficiency, and stay on-top of current and future government policy developments.

Book a demo now to learn how you can stay ahead of competitors and win more contracts.

Posts.Text:
At Ontopical, we love reading Loopio's annual RFP report! (you can find a link in the comments). And you will not guess what we learned... 

On average, nine people put in 32 hours of work to submit RFPs, with a 44% probability of winning. That is a big investment with potentially no return. Astonishingly, we do it 168 times per year on average! 

Tools like Loopio are definitely required to simplify that process. 

We also love Loopio... they did not pay us to say that...

Posts.Article Name: Earnscliffe Tech Profile: Technology disruptors changing the game for public affairs by Earnscliffe Strategies

Posts.Text: Thanks for including us with such an esteemed company, Canada Venture News !

4 reasons you should get serious about selling to local governments in 2023

1. the rest of the world and most businesses will likely be in a recession

2. municipalities and counties discuss their challenges and needs in publicly available documents

3. new opportunities, often funded through trillions of available federal, provincial and state programs, emerge daily

4. local government spends more than $1.8 trillion annually (source: https://lnkd.in/g5Mtj-Si)

#localgovernments #sales #localgovernment #sustainability #climatechange #opportunities #housing #infrastructure

Humbled to see that Ontopical has been named as one of the 15 most interesting software startups in Calgary. Kudos goes to our entire team as this would not be possible without the amazing teamwork that takes place every day. #startups #publicprocurement #ai #marketintelligence #data
Posts.Article Name: Tech Innovations in the Wild West: 15 Software Startups from Calgary Making Waves Across Industries! by canadaventure.news

Posts.Text:
The transition from analog to digital processes by local governments across North America gained momentum after the pandemic forced public services online. This led to new opportunities for Govtech startups creating SaaS tools that engage communities, schedule virtual town hall meetings, mitigate ransomware attacks and more. Ontopical helps Govtech startups find local governments who are looking actively looking for these solutions and have budget in place to take action.
#govtech #govtech2022 #publicengagement #citizenengagement
